name: Code Deployment System
short_description:
This project delegates to application/web developers the ability to deploy code to QA or Production environments  either immediately or on a scheduled basis.

Each deployment will first back up files that are about to be replaced and will provide the ability to easily roll back the changes.

This system will be designed to support file deployments to various UNIX variants and Windows servers.

User interaction will be through a web-based console.
summary: A system to enable developers to deploy code to production servers
